title: (rune reward) 룬 보상 관련해서 문의드립니다.
body:
번역기를 사용한점 양해부탁합니다.
Please use translator.

북미서버 시즌1부터 플레이한 유저입니다.
I have played in North American server season 1

북미서버 때 구입한 룬/룬페이지를 한국서버에서는 보상해주지 않겠다고 해서 문의드립니다.
I would like to contact you about the rune / runepage that I bought when I was in North America server.

한국서버 계정에 보상해주셨으면 합니다.
I would like the compensation to the Korea server account.

12년 11월이전에 구매한 룬/룬페이지가 대다수를 이루고 있고, 부당하다고 생각됩니다.
Rune / rrunpages purchased prior to November 12 are the majority, and I think they are unfair.

한국서버 계정이름은 애쿼빗입니다.
The Korean server account name is 애쿼빗.

replies.body: We can't transfer content between accounts, and a Korean account would be completely separate from your NA account since they're on the Garena servers. We won't be able to help with Garena accounts here in NA, but I do suggest reaching out to your support over there in a ticket to talk about what could be done!

I'll re-translate writer's question.

Sorry for poor english.
I have been playing league of legends since season 1 in NA server, and move it to KR server when KR server was opened.
about Rune compensation, i can't received compensation about bought in NA server.
so, i would like receive compensation about this case to my KR server account.
i was bought most of my runes in 2012 November, but i can't rewarded about that runes, i think it is unfair.

OH! THANK YOU FOR SHOWING UP!!!! I don't have any kind of translator on hand so maybe you could help me help him? 

I understand that bit, but we can't take action on Garena accounts, and since his account wasn't *transferred* I'm not 100% sure what could be done with this specific case. They're going to need to submit a ticket to Garena support for help with this since that is their home server.

Oh, Korea server is definitely different with Garena server. as i know, Garena server is SEA server, and Korea server is seperated with Garena.
When Korea server is opened, Riot transferred account who want move to KR server.
Writer was moved in that time, so he could bought runes in NA server - before opened KR server - but can't receive compensation.

He was send support ticket to KR server support team, but they said that they can't compensation about bought in NA server.
i think it is what he wrote this subject on here.

I'll apologize here again, been a long day with Preseason questions.

Korea Is *not* part of the Garena servers, but we in NA still can't assist with that region. He'll need to keep talking with the agents from his region since we can't take action on other regions accounts like that.

OK, thanks to reply. i'll transfer it to writer.


북미쪽에선 한국쪽에서 일어난 일에 도움을 줄 수 없고, 이 이슈에 대해서는 라코 지원팀으로부터 도움을 받는 수 밖에 없다고 합니다.
